metadata.title: CVE-2024-35972 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:bnxt_en: Fix possible memory leak in bnxt_rdma_aux_device_init() If ulp =kzalloc() fails, the allocated edev will leak because it is not properlyassigned and the cleanup path will not be able to free it. Fix it byassigning it properly immediately after allocation.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.0-38.38').
